Message:
In the distant past, seven demons
wielding catastrophic power were
sealed away by powerful angels.

Now, those demons are only able
to use whatever tiny amount of
power leaks from their seals.

But, us humans are far from perfect.
Each of us has a chink in
the armor of our hearts.

They’re things we don’t even
see as weakness, like traces of
doubt in our minds, arrogance,
or the tiniest sliver of jealousy...

It’s through those tiny cracks
that the demons whisper to us.

Little by little, inch by inch,
their words rot away at us
by giving us that sweet sugar
of temptation...

One day...the Hero of the Staff
and Elaine went missing.

When we went out to search
for the two of them, we saw it.
